93tt_s-8POjvqJtueIOtMg.text: Stopped by after hiking Arthur's Seat.  Had two really good gelatin flavors (raspberry/mint and Ferraro Roche) and they were excellent. This was great, fresh gelato like we had in Italy.  Definitely worth the stop and a bit away from the tourist crowds with average gelato.

9c5wIHHr8BQNdMxHF2HJkg.text: What a great stop after climbing Arthur's seat!  Refreshing iced cappuccino and a waffle hit the spot. The Smoov cream was delicate and refreshing with no after taste.   Love this spot.   Comfy couches and music playing in the background.   Clean bathroom and free WIfi!  What else can I ask for?

photos.caption: Photo of Smoov - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Waffles were delicious and five of us shared a taste. The Smoov cream was heavenly.
Photo of Smoov - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Super nice staff
Photo of Smoov - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Awesome new gelato and coffee place

eiYOeBqb4y9gUqMrmvjTeQ.text: One of the best coffee shops I've been to. I really enjoyed the pour over coffee and my sister loved her gelato. I thought the people serving were fantastic and I felt the love when the coffee was being poured. There are bags of coffee showing the blends, but sadly they weren't available for purchase. I do love to buy coffee when I travel. The owner said she would like to do that soon, but it wasn't an option when I visited. One awesome feature is the floor. The mosaic-ish tiles are beautiful and really brightens the place up.   Strangely, when I think of the name I think, "Smoov move ex-lax", which is super not helpful, but here we are...

photos.caption: Photo of Smoov - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

ciBosPoRO5IEzswnNXHzwA.text: Supernice place.  Ice cream was really good and waffles to.  Coffee was ok!  Visit this place if you like sweets

yKTo9TOBVIiFeJDP7yvJKA.text: Very nice place, cozy atmosphere, great service, Bailey's gelato and other great options.

_Qua8Yj8iOwQ7NR_Uf7awA.text: Constantly kept smooth gelato, no chunks!  If you like smooth almost soft serve consistency this is the place!  A+

ae-iMqem_N-WoCTVaDQ8hg.text: Walking the Royal Mile and was pleasantly surprised by this cute gelato-coffee house.  Best gelato we've had outside of Italy. Very friendly service. We will definitely be back before we leave Edinburgh. No pic because it was eaten quickly!
